/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a two-lane road, divided by a median. On the left side of the road, there are trees lining the sidewalk, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. On the right side, buildings rise, their facades hinting at the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, making the buildings appear taller and the sky more expansive. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky contrasting with the gray of the road and buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the urban environment of Beijing.
